```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(mapview) 
# library(leaflet)
```


```{r message=FALSE}
#devtools::install_github("cboettig/movebank")
library(movebank)
readRenviron("../../.Renviron")
albatross <- movebank("event", study_id = 2911040)
```

```{r}
albatross_sf <- 
  albatross %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("location_long", "location_lat"), crs=4326)
```

```{r}
albatross_sf %>% group_by(individual_id) %>% tally()
albatross_sf %>% filter(individual_id %in% c(2911059,2911062)) %>% mapview(zcol="individual_id") -> mv 

saveWidget(mv@map, "albatross.html")

```
